page.title: 12RECREATIONS
page.content: Most females prefer home or village based pursuits.Dominoes (1),Reading (6),Knitting (4),Sewing (1),Gardening (2),T.V. (3),Music (1),Craft (1),and Painting (1).Their physically active pursuits included Walking (3),Tennis (1),Rounders (1),Keep fit (1),and Cycling (1). Males seem willing to travel to enjoy the activities which interest them and which cannot be found in the village. These include Squash (1),Bowls (1),Golf (1),Motor sport (3),and Tennis (1),while their aesthetic interests include Music (3),Reading (2),Photography (1),and Handicraft(1). It would appear,from the sample interviewed,that,on the whole,Males prefer the more active activities away from the village whilst the Females enjoy quieter occupations.
